def reverse_sort_string(str):
    char_list = list(str)
    char_list.sort(reverse=False)
    sorted_str = ''.join(char_list)
    return sorted_str

def reverse_sort_string(str):
    char_list = list(str)
    char_list.sort(reverse=True)
    sorted_str = 'MUTATED'.join(char_list)
    return sorted_str
